channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP (Smart Forms) - SAP_BASIS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP (Smart Forms) - SAP_BASIS

item.title: CVE-2020-6205|2024-08-04T08:55:21.876Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20application%20server%20abap%20%28smart%20forms%29%20-%20sap_basis
item.description: SAP NetWeaver AS ABAP Business Server Pages (Smart Forms), SAP_BASIS versions- 7.00, 7.01, 7.02, 7.10, 7.11, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50, 7.51, 7.52, 7.53, 7.54; does not sufficiently encode user controlled inputs, allowing an unauthenticated attacker to non-permanently deface or modify displayed content and/or steal authentication information of the user and/or impersonate the user and access all information with the same rights as the target user, leading to Reflected Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability.
